Articles.Content:
Not to be all spammy and stuff... well, okay. Yeah, to be a little spammy...

TenTonHammer just posted one of my articles and it's about KSP's new update and I wanted to share it.

I know I don't do much more than lurk in the forums, so self-promoting is sort of a no-no, but I'm hoping it can be forgiven a little since I'm really just trying to spread the word about a fantastic game. Hopefully the post is more successful than my latest rocket design. =/
